title: How sample libraries are changing pop music
description:
Justin Bieber and two other artists used the same synth melody in three different songs. Switched On Pop's Charlie Harding explains how that's increasingly common in an industry where copyright has become so stringent.

Featuring
@charlieharding

Links to resources discussed
What Happens When Justin Bieber Samples Your Music

Host:
Allegra Frank @legsfrank

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
